text.data: Rush: [character][0x1]... wake up! You felt it at Dafila, didn't you? From now on this is our time.[end]W
We can't leave it up to all the adults like Matelite... You know?[end]
That's right... I dunno...[end1]D

Do you really understand... Our time... We have to make it change...
Even [character][0x1] would think that's the best way.[end]L
Looks like you still don't get it... I thought about it hard in my own way. Doing this is for the best. Our time... We're going to change it. Even [character][0x1] understands...[end]M
Manyooo! [0x28]We told him![0x29][end]M
Manyooo! [0x28]I won't say that I want a tip or anything![0x29][end]M
Munyoo!! [0x28]Matelite and the others are scared out of their wits![0x29][end]M
Monyoo! [0x28]Okay! We'll have our own Mini-Devil Revolution now![0x29][end]M
Manyoo! [0x28]No being jealous and acting like us!![0x29][end]M
Munyooo! [0x28]Even Mini-Devils have ideas too![0x29][end][character][0x1]
[character][0x1]... You're gonna be accompanying us for a little while![end]M
Matelite: Hey, you! What do you think you're doing! Open this door up now![end]R
Rush: You think we're gonna open it? Hah![end]M
Matelite: Do you guys know what happens when someone insults me!![end]R
Rush: Okay, we're done shopping... I guess we should let him in... Don't you think so too, Truce?[end]T
Truce: ......[end]R
Rush: Listen up! I'm gonna be the one feeding you! Get in line![end]R
Rush: Gimme some advice here, [character][0x1]![end]A
All done![end]N
Next, please![end]O
Okay![end]O
Okay, on to the next one![end]T

This way I'll have no regrets...
Okay! Let's go talk to Matelite![end]T
Taicho: [character][0x1] is...[end][character][0x1]
[character][0x1]...!![end][character][0x1]

[character][0x1]: The door will open...
The Holy Dragons are trying to open the door to a new era...[end]T
Truce: The door to a new era...?! What in the world is happening?[end]M
Matelite: [character][0x1]... we can talk later. For now we must protect [character][0x1]!![end]H
Here we go! [character][0x1]!! Rush!! Follow me![end]R
Rush: Matelite... I...[end]R
Rush: Hey! Come here![end]O
Oh yeah... I've always wanted to do this at least once![end]S
Shopping!! [character][0x1]... I'll let you choose the goods. This might be your last time to buy anything! I might become the leader, you see... So don't hold back on your spending![end]M

Matelite: I... I've only been thinking about [character][0x1] when fighting...
I can't help it if you guys have bad things to say...
But right now, [character][0x1]'s...[end]R
Rush: Do you really think I'll open it up for you?! Okay, time for shopping...[end]M

Matelite: I can't do a thing... Even though [character][0x1] is suffering...
Come on, [character][0x1]... Rush... At least let me be by your side...[end]R

Rush: No... wait... Matelite might be trying to trick us by pretending to cry!
A new era...!! I've decided I'm going to live full of vigor!
I still have to take care of one more thing...[end]R
Rush: Feeding the dragons to their hearts' content...!![end]T

Truce: I don't think this method is very good...
Please try to put up with it, Captain [character][0x1]...[end]T
Truce: [character][0x1]... For [character][0x1]'s sake we're...[end]B
Bikkebakke: That's out of the question. I can't trust anybody anymore...[end][end]
